text: David Burton (1877–1963) was a Russian-born American film director of the 1930s. He had previously worked as a theater director.Aaker p.21 ==Selected filmography== * The Bishop Murder Case (1930) * Free and Easy (1930) * Strictly Unconventional (1930) * Fighting Caravans (1931) * Dancers in the Dark (1932) * Brief Moment (1933) * The Romantic Age (1934) * Princess O'Hara (1935) * The Melody Lingers On (1935) * The Man Who Wouldn't Talk (1940) * Manhattan Heartbeat (1940) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Everett Aaker.
